data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Mangilao, Guam.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mangilao, Guam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2,417 believers in the state of Mangilao the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Mangilao, Guam to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Mangilao who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mangilao Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mangilao Village, Mangilao, Guam.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Mangilao, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 15,200 people living in the state of Mangilao.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mangilao, Guam has a population of 15,200.

We estimate Mangilao has 2,417 people who might know Jesus, 11,647 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,136 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Mangilao, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
